message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.AI 

The paper discusses the presence of security vulnerabilities in automotive networks and proposes an approach for detecting unknown CAN devices and determining the distance between the attacker device and the sensing unit. This involves the use of Intrusion Detection Systems (IDSs) and Time Domain Reflectometry (TDR) technique. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also involves network communication and software systems, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). Additionally, the paper deals with automotive networks, which could place it in cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
